apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: iOS torrent client app
apps.versionDescription:
- Most of the application was rewritten from scratch, no more memory leaks
- Significantly improved stability of the app
- Memory management implemented
- Memory allocation for files before downloading
- Libtorrent updated to 1.2.6
- UI improvements, noticeable and not so much
- Added integration with Patreon
apps.localizedDescription: iTorrent is a torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

apps.name: Infuse Pro 7
apps.subtitle: Un lecteur vidéo élégant
apps.versionDescription: Amélioration de la performance et de la stabilité de l'application Pour les détails complets, visitez firecore.com/releases Merci beaucoup d'utiliser Infuse!
apps.localizedDescription:
Ignite your video content with Infuse – the beautiful way to watch almost any video format on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV. No need to convert files! Infuse is optimized for iOS 13, with powerful streaming options, Trakt sync, and unmatched AirPlay & subtitle support. Gorgeous interface. Precise controls. And silky-smooth playback.

- PLAY MORE VIDEO TYPES

A powerful video player that plays just about anything, including the standard MP4, M4V and MOV – plus MKV, AVI, WMV, MTS, ISO, VIDEO_TS, FLV, OGM, OGV, ASF, 3GP, DVR-MS, WebM, and WTV. Includes fully certified Dolby® Digital Plus (AC3/E-AC3), DTS® and DTS-HD® audio.

- STREAM FROM OTHER DEVICES

Browse and play videos stored on your Mac, PC, NAS, Wi-Fi hard drive, UPnP/DLNA apps like Plex and Kodi (XBMC), or from cloud services like Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive – no syncing required!

- AIRPLAY & GOOGLE CAST OPTIONS

Stream a wide variety of videos types such as MKV, MP4, M4V, and others over AirPlay & Google Cast with full surround sound and subtitles.

- TRAKT 2-WAY SYNC

Connect with Trakt to sync watched history, submit ratings and post comments.

- OPTIMIZED SUBTITLES POWERED BY OPENSUBTITLES

Bring your own subtitles, or download them on the fly (for free) in virtually any language.

=====

MORE THAN JUST A PRETTY FACE

THE BASICS

- Silky-smooth video player (plays full 4K w/ HDR & Dolby Vision)
- Stream from a Mac, PC, NAS or Wi-Fi enabled hard drive
- Connect with Plex, Kodi (XBMC), WMC and most other UPnP/DLNA servers
- Beautiful layout with quick access to video info
- Artwork and metadata added automatically
- Split View & PIP

SUPPORTED FORMATS

- Video: 3GP, AVI, ASF, BDMV, DIVX, DVDMEDIA, DVR-MS, FLV, ISO, M4V, MKV, MOV, MP4, M2TS, MTS, OGM, OGV, TP, TS, VIDEO_TS, WEBM, WMV, WTV
- Audio: AAC, AC3/E-AC3, DOLBY TRUEHD, DTS, DTS-HD MA, FLAC, MP3, OGG, PCM, WMA
- Subtitles: DVB, DVDSUB, MICRODVD, MPL2, PGS, SMI, SSA/ASS, SRT, SUB, TIMED TEXT, TMP, TXT, VOBSUB, XSUB

PLAYER FEATURES

- Multiple audio tracks
- Chapters
- Gesture controls
- 8 video zoom options
- Continuous playback
- TV out via HDMI or VGA adapter
- Deinterlacing

EXTRAS

- Folders
- One-click subtitle downloads from OpenSubtitles
- Scrobble plays to Trakt
- Download videos from networked devices
- Drag and drop uploads via web browser
- Get extra onboard storage with SanDisk iXpand

GET MORE WITH INFUSE PRO!

- Play even more video formats
- Enjoy Dolby® Digital Plus (AC3/E-AC3), DTS® and DTS-HD® mobile surround sound
- Stream a wide variety of video types over AirPlay and Google Cast
- Access videos stored in cloud services like Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, and OneDrive
- Sync libraries, settings, watched history, and playback progress between devices

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Frii Premium
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

• All kinds of ads removed
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Enable extreme streaming quality
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from the Music app

 - Disable delivery and typing indicators
 - Select unlimited number of photos to send
 - Password-protect the app

 - Lock chats
 - Enables send button while offline
 - Customization of the app's user interface

apps.name: AltStore Beta
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
NEW
• Adds "Back Up" option when long pressing app to manually back up app data, which can then be restored later.
• GM version of 1.3.4

PREVIOUS UPDATE:

**Requires AltServer 1.3.1 beta. Download from https://altstore.io/altserver/beta/**

IMPORTANT
iOS 13.5 (due for release soon) changes how active apps are counted. Previously, app extensions counted towards the 3 active app limit, and inactive apps could remain installed without counting. Now, app extensions are excluded, but inactive apps must be uninstalled to not count.

On devices running iOS 13.5 or later, apps will now be backed up & uninstalled when deactivated. When you later activate an inactive app, AltStore will reinstall the app and restore its data so you can continue using it as if it was never uninstalled.

NOTE: This does not affect devices running iOS 13.4.1 or earlier.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore adds support for 3rd party sources, allowing you to download apps from other developers directly through AltStore.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta Beta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
Delta, meet melonDS! melonDS is a modern Nintendo DS emulator that is more accurate and reliable than DeSmuME. melonDS is actively being worked on and supports many features DeSmuME does not, which is why Delta now includes a melonDS emulator core 🎉 melonDS will soon become the default, so please report any issues you find! 

NEW FEATURES
• New core based on melonDS for DS emulation (will soon become the default)
• DS settings screen to switch cores and import melonDS BIOS files
• Fast forward DS games
• Action Replay cheat codes for DS games (melonDS core)
• Boot directly to Nintendo DS home screen and change system settings (melonDS core)
• Access Delta files directory in Files > On My iPhone > Delta
• Support for 8-character NES Game Genie cheat codes
• Export save files for games from context menu

BUG FIXES
• Fixes graphical issues when playing DS games
• Fixes incorrect formatting when entering cheat codes
• Fixes incorrect game name text color after deleting a game or switching cores
• Fixes save files being overwritten when previewing games

Switching to melonDS has been a _big_ transition, so please report any and all bugs you find using the melonDS core. Enjoy!
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
• Playing DS games
• Save States
• Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
• Fast Forward
• Cheats
• Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Clip Beta
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
• Disables notification vibration when sound is disabled for notifications.

Assuming all goes well, this should be the final beta before the public launch! Please report any last minute bugs you find to support@altstore.io.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

• Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
• Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
• Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

apps.subtitle: The 80s (and 90s) in your pocket.

apps.name: Lensa: Photo Editor
apps.subtitle: One touch Photo Editor
apps.localizedDescription: Lensa is a brand new way of making your selfies look better, than you could have ever imagined. Forget about conventional filters and photo editing tools. We bring you the simplest, yet the most practical mobile app to date for perfecting your selfies on the go. So, if there’s anything you think should be corrected in your selfie, you now have this amazing, simple app to help you. To unlock unlimited photos, tap on purchase and then cancel!
